DOC.brief_title: Remote Ischemic Preconditioning Subcortical Vascular Dementia
DOC.detailed_description: In randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled trial , investigator enrol 52 participant age 50-80 year . The participant diagnosis subcortical vascular dementia neurology department Tianjin medical university general hospital . Inclusion criterion include clinical dementia rating 1-2 ; mini-mental state examination score 15-26 ; brain magnetic resonance image consistent subcortical ischemic small vessel disease . All participant receive standard medical management.Participants remote ischemic preconditioning group undergo 5 brief cycle consist bilateral upper limb ischemia follow reperfusion . The remote ischemic precondition procedure perform daily 180 consecutive day . Cognitive impairment assessment scale ( Hopkins Verbal Learning Test , HVLT ; Symbol digital modality te , SDMT ; judgement line orientation , JLO ; trail make test A B , TMT-A/B ; chinese word fluency test ; Activity Daily Living Scale , ADL ; Neuropsychiatric Inventory , NPI ) , serological inflammatory marker : hypersensitive C-reactive protein（hs-CRP）、plasma tumor necrosis factor-α ( TNF-α ) 、interleukin-1β ( IL-1β ) 、interleukin-6 ( IL-6 ) 、α1-antichymotrypsin ) , MRI diffusion tensor imaging , DTI compare untreated control group .
